alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:28PM EDT until July 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHTENAW COUNTY... At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ypsilanti, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Willis around 435 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township and Whittaker. People attending Ann Arbor Art Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
